DOC.brief_summary: This study shall investigate the feasibility of the use of cool-caps in the preclinical setting in patients with successful primary cardio-pulmonary resuscitation Hypothesis: cool-caps are efficient and feasible to use in the preclinical setting in patients after successful CPR.
DOC.criteria: All patients with primary successful CPR Age < 18 Pregnancy Severe bleeding or severe trauma Body core temperature < 34 degrees celsius
